All Implemented Interfaces:
BackEndInterface, LowLevelBackEndInterface, QueryInterface
public class MRHBasePersistentBackEnd
extends HBasePersistentBackEnd

Implement HBase optimizations for the back-end. Will implement and link up actual Map/Reduce plug-ins here

Specified by:

Specified by:
getFeaturesByTag in interface QueryInterface
Overrides:
getFeaturesByTag in class SimplePersistentBackEnd
Parameters:

set - parent feature set
subject - tag subject (always required)
